model.name: GaussianProcess

parameter.name: loss_function
parameter.description: Type of binarization target. Used only in Reggression tasks.

parameter.name: iterations
parameter.description:
The maximum number of trees that can be built when solving machine learning problems.
When using other parameters that limit the number of iterations, the final number of trees may be less than the number specified in this parameter.

model.parameter:
Type of binarization target. Used only in Reggression tasks.
string Median UniformAndQuantiles GreedyLogSum MaxLogSum MinEntropy MinEntropy

parameter.name: learning_rate
parameter.description:
The learning rate.
Used for reducing the gradient step.

parameter.name: depth
parameter.description: Depth of a tree. All trees are the same depth.

parameter.name: subsample_ratio
parameter.description: Subsample ratio of columns when constructing each tree. Also known as rsm.

parameter.name: border_count
parameter.description: The number of partitions for Num features. Used in the preliminary calculation. Also known as number of bins.

parameter.name: fold_permutation_block_size
parameter.description: To accelerate the learning. The recommended value is within [1, 256]. On small samples, must be set to 1.

parameter.name: leaf_estimation_iterations
parameter.description: The number of steps in the gradient when calculating the values in the leaves.
